title: Add fallback handling for incomplete indicator data

backend.notes: All tests pass with new fallback handling

hierarchical_strategy.py.missing_important_handling: Logs warning, applies fallbacks, continues scoring

acceptance_criteria.criterion: No crashes when indicators are incomplete
acceptance_criteria.evidence: Null check at line 355, fallbacks applied for all non-critical indicators

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Opportunities with insufficient data are skipped
acceptance_criteria.evidence: Returns None if indicators dict empty or critical indicators missing

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Scoring only proceeds with valid data
acceptance_criteria.evidence: Scoring starts at line 448 only after validation and fallback application
